newsitem.title: USA: Hedstrom Corp sells $135 mln in two-part deal.
newsitem.headline: Hedstrom Corp sells $135 mln in two-part deal.

text.p: The following two-tranche debt deal from Hedstrom Corp was priced on Monday in the 144a private placement market via Credit Suisse First Boston Corp, according to market souces.
TYPE SNR SUB NOTES ISS PRICE 100.00 FIRST PAY DATE 12/1/1997

NOTE: THREE-YEAR EQUITY CALL FOR 40 PERCENT AT 110.
TYPE SNR DISC NOTES ISS PRICE 56.0387 FIRST PAY DATE
LAST MOODY'S CAA YIELD 12.00 PCT PAY FREQ

NOTE: THREE-YEAR EQUITY CALL FOR 30 PERCENTT AT 112 PERCENT OF ACCRETED VALUE. THE ZERO COUPON BONDS WERE SOLD AS UNITS WITH WARRANTS TO PURCHASE UP TO FOUR PERCENT OF THE COMPANY. ((U.S. Corporate Bond Unit, 212-859-1678))
